channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Add Post URL
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Add Post URL

item.title: CVE-2022-1913|2024-08-03T00:17:00.938Z -- unknown -- add%20post%20url
item.description: The Add Post URL WordPress plugin through 2.1.0 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack and lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping
